lead_paragraph: PLAYER In Germany, the 22-year-old Brazilian midfielder Diego scored a goal in Werder Bremen’s 1-1 tie with Bayern Munich on Sunday. Diego denied reports last week that he was contemplating a summer move to Juventus of Italy.
